page.title: 10KIRKBURTON MIDDLE SCHOOL
page.content: There are over 500 pupils in our school which is a large one storey building. Its grounds are about 14 acres. The school is divided into three year groups and we start at 10 and leave at 13. We have maths and English most days and other lessons once or twice a week. We have a library, craft area, cooking area, science lab., large hall and small hall. Dinners, costing 50p each, are cooked in the school but you can bring sandwiches. Our uniform is grey skirts for girls and grey or black trousers for boys. Both sexes have a shirt, grey jumper and maroon tie. The uniform would cost about Â£40. Some people walk to school but most people come by bus. The bus fare is between 15p and 30p one way. I think it is a good school and very educational.
